CampIntro.synopsis: Another duergar greets you on the other side of the lake after sailingthere with captain Greymon.Both duergar are surly, but Morghal in particular. She is suspicious of Absolutists, but happy to take their coin. She should be gruff, and absolutely not listless. She tells you that Nere is trapped above.

Camp.synopsis: Default dialog for the captain of the raft at the duergar camp. In default state, he encourages you to talk to the sergeant, as he has already told you to do that in previous dialogue.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The 'CampIntro' session appears to be an initial greeting session, where a duergar (Morghal) meets the player and gives some initial context. The 'Camp' session, on the other hand, is the default dialog for the captain at the camp and specifically mentions that the player has already received some dialogue in a previous conversation. This implies that 'CampIntro' should logically be triggered before 'Camp'. There are no indications that these sessions should be mutually exclusive.

CampIntro_31.speaker: Corsair Greymon
CampIntro_31.text: Dry land. My guts'll stop churning now.
CampIntro_31.context: CinematicNodeContext: The boat arrives and the captain and players disembark.

CampIntro_32.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_32.text: Greymon, you shithead - time you showed up. We got trouble.

CampIntro_43.speaker: Corsair Greymon
CampIntro_43.text: Spit it up, Morghal. Or you busy choking on that True Soul Nere's prick with Thrinn?

CampIntro_16.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_16.text: Drugh no. The twat-Soul caused a rockfall. Trapped tighter than a ring on a fat finger.
CampIntro_16.context: NodeContext: DRUGH NO = FUCK NO. "Droog" like 'good', not 'food'.

CampIntro_25.speaker: Corsair Greymon
CampIntro_25.text: You're shitting me. He pay up?

CampIntro_40.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_40.text: That's the trouble - he got the gold on him. Thrinn's arm's falling off what with the gnome slaves she been beating.

CampIntro_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Morghal peers at player and looks them up and down.

CampIntro_17.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_17.text: Who's the hoon, Greymon - another slave for the dig?

CampIntro_29.speaker: Player
CampIntro_29.text: I am a True Soul. And you will speak with respect.

CampIntro_14.speaker: Player
CampIntro_14.text: I'm here to see the sergeant. I have her boots.

CampIntro_4.speaker: Player
CampIntro_4.text: I was told to report to the sergeant.

CampIntro_24.speaker: Player
CampIntro_24.text: Did I hear right? You keep gnomes as slaves?

CampIntro_9.speaker: Corsair Greymon
CampIntro_9.text: Easy to feed, fat thumbs for digging. Won't find none better.

CampIntro_12.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_12.text: But your type got their uses. Let's get those meat-paws to work.

CampIntro_1.speaker: Player
CampIntro_1.text: I am a True Soul. You will treat me with honour.

CampIntro_36.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_36.text: Your Twat-Soul chum owes us a load of coin. You want in? Pay the toll.

CampIntro_0.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_0.text: I call it the True Soul special.
CampIntro_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Morghal smiles creepily.NodeContext: Morghal smiles creepily.

CampIntro_7.speaker: Player
CampIntro_7.text: Fine - take this. Consider it a goodwill gesture. |XXX gold|

CampIntro_6.speaker: Corsair Greymon
CampIntro_6.text: I'll be shagged to Shanatar. Shit's looking up.

CampIntro_37.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_37.text: But I'm warning you - that twat-Soul ain't settle up soon, there'll be hell to pay for the lot of you cult-buggers.

CampIntro_27.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_27.text: Now go on, sergeant's above. Can't miss her - just follow the screams.

CampIntro_22.speaker: Player
CampIntro_22.text: You must be joking. I am not giving you a single coin.

CampIntro_5.speaker: Player
CampIntro_5.text: Such insolence. I should take your head for this.

CampIntro_23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Morghal grins evilly and brandishes a blade - then smiles and puts her blade back.

CampIntro_33.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_33.text: Unclog your hole - just shitting around.

CampIntro_3.speaker: Player
CampIntro_3.text: I'm here to see the sergeant. I have her boots.

CampIntro_18.speaker: Corsair Greymon
CampIntro_18.text: Aye, that they do. Found the hoon sailing Gekh's skiff.

CampIntro_2.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_2.text: Clan's on edge - as like to tear a stranger right up.

CampIntro_8.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_8.text: You want in? Pay the toll. You'll slip through like a dagger through dung.

CampIntro_39.speaker: Player
CampIntro_39.text: I was told to report to the sergeant. I have not come to work.

CampIntro_30.speaker: Player
CampIntro_30.text: My reasons for coming are private. Now step aside.

CampIntro_38.speaker: Corsair Greymon
CampIntro_38.text: Aye. They sniffed up Gekh's corpse. Found the hoon sailing his skiff.

CampIntro_41.speaker: Corsair Greymon
CampIntro_41.text: Aye. One of those Absolute crackpots. Found the hoon sailing Gekh's skiff.

CampIntro_11.speaker: Morghal
CampIntro_11.text: Been wanting a reason to choke the life out of you, shit-for-brains.
CampIntro_11.context: NodeContext: Low rage, about to fight.

CampIntro_35.speaker: Player
CampIntro_35.text: My business is my own. No need to concern yourself with it.

Camp_1.speaker: Corsair Greymon
Camp_1.text: Cough up some coin or bugger off. I'm outta nice things to say.

Camp_5.speaker: Corsair Greymon
Camp_5.text: You had our backs. Guess you True Souls ain't all bad.

Camp_17.speaker: Corsair Greymon
Camp_17.text: I mean, still don't like ya. But you're not a total gobshite. Bah. You buying?
Camp_17.context: NodeContext: Said roughly but with a tough of affection. 'Bah' cause greymon doesn't like talking about FEELINGS.

Camp_19.speaker: Corsair Greymon
Camp_19.text: Come back any time. I'll be here - enjoying the show.
Camp_19.context: NodeContext: Pleased at the grym scene before him

Camp_10.speaker: Corsair Greymon
Camp_10.text: Seeing as I ain't getting paid soon, I need all the coin I can bloody get.

Camp_15.speaker: Corsair Greymon
Camp_15.text: Urgh. I take it back - you're an absolute gobshite.
Camp_15.context: NodeContext: Absolute disgust at the player's affection

Camp_0.speaker: Corsair Greymon
Camp_0.context: NodeContext: Gruff but pleased. Greymon thinks better of the player.

Camp_7.speaker: Corsair Greymon
Camp_7.text: Thought you were a True Soul - didn't figure you'd off Nere.

Camp_11.speaker: Corsair Greymon
Camp_11.text: Thrinn's in a right ball-ache. That rubble ain't budgin' - no matter how hard she whips them gnomes. Nere is gonna be pissed.
Camp_11.context: NodeContext: Taking gruff delight in the scene

Camp_6.speaker: Corsair Greymon
Camp_6.text: What you want anyway? Here to yap or looking to buy? Dry land means fresh stock.
Camp_6.context: NodeContext: gruff and back to business

Camp_20.speaker: Corsair Greymon
Camp_20.text: Heh. Waitin' for Thrinn to blow a gasket and start kicking the rubble. Best thing I've seen in a tenday.
Camp_20.context: NodeContext: Taking gruff delight in the scene

Camp_14.speaker: Corsair Greymon
Camp_14.text: Either part with coin or jog on. Don't want to miss any of this.
Camp_14.context: NodeContext: Taking gruff delight in the scene
